creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: Spreading of toxic rhetoric at the RNC, and the bullets at Kenosha are expressions of the same hateful ideology promoted and cultivated by the Regime. Even though the killings and lies had been sustained for a ong time, the renewed fervor and intensity makes today a superspreader.
title: August 26, 2020: Superspreader (Kenosha + RNC)
